body_html: @apacha It might be windows magic. I did not want to sound judgmental as I had no idea. I think windows magic is possible as the cuDNN calls should not have changed and thus backwards compatible seems likely. For the linux builds TensorFlow is looking for specific files (or that is what it looks like when I get errors) and is very unhappy if it does not find cudnnblahblah.6.so. Thanks for the update and specifics.
